email-template.subject: Commercial purchase approved. Offline Payment required.
email-template.body:
Dear #greetname# (#username#)
This e-mail is to confirm that your commercial purchase order (#ordernum#) placed on #datePlaced# has been approved and now requires off line payment.
You will be contacted shortly by a member of our admin team to complete payment.
You can login to Asset Bank (http://www.assetbank.co.uk/ecommerce) and proceed to the 'My Purchases-> My Orders' section to view your approved order. Your login details are: Your username: #username# Your password: #password#
Your order details, commercial options approved and terms and conditions are
#orderDetails#
#terms#
Thank you for purchasing images from AssetBank.
Regards, assetbank.com, admin
